message: n 2017, the Institute on Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault reported that more than 300,000 people in Texas are victims of human trafficking, including 80,000 underage boys and girls who are forced into prostitution.

data.description: Written by Ayesha Muzaffar, 2018 Leland Fellow Human trafficking, whether it is sex trafficking or labor trafficking, is a form of modern-day slavery. Human trafficking is when an individual…
data.title: Refusing to Turn a Blind Eye: Human Trafficking Horrors in Houston
